title: Venus Williams picks up the racket again in Miami
text:

Venus Williams has not officially retired from tennis, and a nebula surrounds her plans to leave this sport. After declining an invitation from the Indian Wells tournament, no one expected to see the American wielding the racket at the Miami Open 2025, not to compete, but to train with Ons Jabeur. It is unknown if this is a sporadic maneuver to spar with the Tunisian or if it could be the seed of a joint collaboration.
Venus Williams practicing with Ons Jabeur at the Miami Open.
